entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue for remaining AssemblyBuilder.Save work in .NET 9 #92975
    9.0.0
  • What really defines the result of typeof(MyType).GetHashCode()? #92973
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator should have better docs and public API #92972
  • .Net 8 RC1 Regression: error BLAZORSDK1001: Unable to find '{dll list}' to be lazy loaded later. Confirm that project or package references are included and the reference is used in the project. #92965
  • Missing Microsoft.Extensions.* package README files #92963
  • [API Proposal]: Support true singletons through IServiceCollection #92957
  • Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` and add `network.peer.port` #92956
    8.0.0
  • illink - Task host node exited prematurely #92951
  • consider running all libraries unit tests with bogus machine culture #92949
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds failing Subset assertion #92944
  • [QUIC] Document asyn exceptions #92943
    9.0.0
  • ChangeDocumentationFileForPackaging causes incremental build issues inside VS #92940
    9.0.0
  • JIT/SIMD/CircleInConvex_[r]/[ro] are failing on arm64 Mono interpreter #92925
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #92942
  • X509Certificate2Collection.Import() fails with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException: An internal error occurred #92921
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.String..ctor(System.SByte*)` et all to use UTF-8 on Windows #92919
  • Rename `dns.lookupS.duration` to `dns.lookup.duration` #92917
    8.0.0

Closed

  • crossgen2.pdb not found on disk for Build Installer Build and Test coreclr freebsd_x64 Release #92961
  • Spec update for Thread.Name property #85635
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot isinst branch trimming #92850
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_float_1_r/expl_float_1_r.dll #92382
    9.0.0
  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the `!ThreadPool` command when using the Windows thread pool #90443
    8.0.0
  • CI failure: The file crossgen2.pdb to be packed was not found on disk. #92930
  • Task host node exited prematurely #92950
  • [Test failure] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds #92945
  • Configuration Binding Generator Fails to Generate Required Method #92771
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonElement.TryGetDouble() succeeds when the value is not representable as a double #92631
  • `QuicConnection.ConnectAsync` raises `SocketException` when host not found #78751
    8.0.0
  • API Discussion: HttpContent #91111
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer` throws for `InlineArrayAccessOperation` #88684
    9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Zero SIMD vectors with movi on arm64 #92873
    9.0.0
  • [TestFailure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: "https://wrong.host.badssl.com") #85329
    9.0.0
  • Excessive zero extension #92887
    9.0.0
  • Filter keywords are silently dropped when the provider name is '*' #12199
    Future
  • Private method on EventSource failed manifest construction #12200
    Future
  • 8.0 Performance regression #92530

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92978
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92977
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-area-label
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix the path for crossgen2 for the outerloop cg2 legs #92971
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #92970
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #92969
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] WBT inner loop improvements #92968
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Replace CMake Object Interfaces with CMake 3.20 Objects #92966
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing perf pipeline #92964
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix duplicate file name generated by GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_General.cs #92954
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0] Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92947
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Merge SIMD stores into wider SIMDs #92939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0] Use invariant culture in CBOR date encoding #92924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 8.0.0
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue with reflection invoke and pointer types #92922
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Adding a vectorized implementation of TensorPrimitives.Log #92960
    area-System.Numerics
  • Minimal ILGenerator implementation for new AssemblyBuilder.Save #92846
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource package readme update #92962
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm] wasmbrowser - change the default webserver port to 0, to randomly select a port #92952
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix illink task lock during live build #92928
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • runtime-wasm-perf: add triggers for PRs #92799
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Expand unaligned address recognition for ARM32 #92938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92912
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Use intended ports when running `DevServer` #92906
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Disable `TensorPrimitivesTests.ConvertToHalf_SpecialValues` #92953
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Adding Log2 tests covering some special values #92946
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix publishing PGO assets #92958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't publish crossgen2 as NativeAOT when doing a cross-os build. #92948
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91916
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Condition the use of NetCoreAppPrevious TFM #92941
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI: Don't trigger runtime pipelines on perf pipeline only changes #92903
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92937
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make config binding gen incremental (#89587) #92730
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add testing for #92539. #92926
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 9.0.0
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Use intended ports when running DevServer #92913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • This vectorizes TensorPrimitives.Log2 #92897
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Arm64 SIMD regs are now zeroed with movi instead of eor #92882
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Disable CodeQL in superpmi-collect pipeline #92872
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [infra] Disable failing test on tvos with Native AOT #92893
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92890
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92886
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Use specific version of v8 with runtime tests #92845
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable MSVC warnings #92895
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Disabled failing tests on Mono Android and interpreter lanes to keep CI green #92728
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stop generating catch funclets #2399
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pop fewer virtual unwind frames explicitly #2402
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM Merge sep 23 #2396
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816

Closed

  • /ignoreprojectextensions:.dcproj not working #18259
  • Is it safe to delete older .NET runtimes? #18248
  • Project references with ReferenceOutputAssembly=false still get runtimeconfig and deps.json files from referenced projects #18207
  • Container tooling creates many HTTP connections #35753
  • SDK reports a number of new errors when multi-targeting and enabling AOT/Trim analyzers #35528
  • SDK shouldn't upload manifest separately when uploading tags. #35431
  • Container publish changes in DN8.P6 not adequately documented in release notes #34272
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 installed, Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\dotnet\templates\8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41.nupkg(/content/BlazorWeb-CSharp/.template.config/localize/templatestrings.cs.json)".. displays during creating project. #35768

PullRequests

Created

  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged
  • Import Publish SDK from base .NET SDK #35834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.403 #35833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.310 #35832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.113 #35831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.416 #35830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.319 #35829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.124 #35828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Containers: reuse HTTP connections more. #35754
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag: handle rtm and servicing channels. #35775
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.0
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35489
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #35807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • SDK resolver perf: Don't check current process for dotnet.exe on .NET Framework #35805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only suggestions for types are shown after typing `.` following `is SomeType` pattern #70226
  • SymbolAsMember API produces unexpected result for tuple members #70225
    17.9
  • Annoying completion when trying to insert a semi-colon in a switch expression #70224
  • Compiler could/should be better in how it emits equality for records. #70221
  • C#: IntelliSense unimported suggestion items does not automatically add global namespace to using statement it adds #70218
  • GetConversion yields incorrect result on collection expression with spread in error case #70217
    17.9

Closed

  • To prevent an unsafe abort when evaulating the function #39559
    Backlog
  • Exceptions in WithDocumentContentsFrom after upgrading analyzers #70008
    17.8 P3
  • C# Interactive Window should default to .NET Core if the current project targets it #63563
    Backlog
  • dotnet build-server shutdown doesn't work on MacOs #70166
    17.9
  • Collection expressions: rectify ctor check in conversions #70182
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Create and cache a singleton directive parser inside the lexer #70223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: ImmutableArray optimization #70222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve checksum perf #70220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Immunize System.Linq methods #70219
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small piece of fallout from teh prior progress API pr. #70215
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Insert Roslyn 17.8 to VS 17.8 #70216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Web adapter API to convert between ASP.NET Core and System.Web types #51119
  • Opaque redirect handler results in message "Error: 405 Method Not Allowed" in Blazor app #51118
  • Blazor: Page scroll is incorrectly reset after a page refresh #51112
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51111
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51110
  • Consolidate Blazor Web App terminology: "Interactive render mode" vs "Interactivity type" vs "hosting model" #51108
  • IIS hosting. AspNetCoreModuleV2. NullReferenceException when SignalR socket disconnected #51105
  • Failed integrity metadata check for Blazor application (NET7) #51104
  • Add [RenderModeStatic] attribute #51102
  • When Calling Methods From JS To DotNet #51100
  • .NET 8 RC1 Controller chooses different JsonConverter compared to .NET 6/7 #51098
  • [Blazor Server] Missing Event Callback Parameters Does Not Throw Errors. #51097
  • WebAssembly.DevServer (The SSL connection could not be established) #51093
  • Session cookie ITicketStore & ISecureDataFormat #51092
  • Invalidating ModelMetadata #51091
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51090

Closed

  • Support Windows NamedPipe's in Kestrel #14207
    8.0-rc2
  • Form post failed to bind to Uri property in Blazor web app #51072
    8.0.0
  • Full stack web UI with Blazor #46636
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.2.23451.1] SPOTClient reported Telerik.UI.for.Blazor package error on the login page. #50525
    8.0.0
  • rc1 tag cross build failed for ppc64le #50679
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: single_query #51089
  • RC1 Blazor Web App NavMenu Has Double Icons When Importing Bootstrap Icons Script In Head #50737
    8.0.0
  • Quarantine `ServerErrorNotificationTest.ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Dismiss` and `ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Reload` #50377
    8.0.0
  • Building ASP.NET Core from source fails with an error (MissingMethodException System.Text.Json.JsonDocument System.Text.Json.JsonDocument.Parse) #50479
  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #50960
  • Blazor WebAssembly Template Project Structure Is Inconsistent With Blazor Web App Template In .NET 8 RC1 #51103
  • IISUrlRewrite: {HTTP_HOST} contains port number #9713
    9.0-preview1
  • H #51099
  • BlazorWeb, require button names to have a matching code-behind variable. #51081
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51074
  • HubProtocolVersionTests.ClientUsingOldCallWithNewProtocol is flaky #48733
  • Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project #51003

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51117
    area-signalr, feature-client-net
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #51116
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #51115
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Use token expiration value from options as fallback #51113
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Re-structure Blazor Project Templates #51107
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • refactor addedToDom #51095
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Selenium updates. #51087
    area-infrastructure
  • Rename metrics tag exception.type to error.type #51084
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2282521 #51109
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK. #51086
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Form data mapping] Support for mapping URIs from form data #51019
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2282521 #50997
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Add SERVER_NAME variable to IISUrlRewrite #51020
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Test-fixed reactions #51079
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Rename bootstrap icons that are used in templates #51060
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add migrations with different assemblies, using Console App. #31948
  • Missing package README file #31947
  • Error when trying to parameterize Property from ExecuteUpdateAsync: "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.TypedParameterExpression' to type 'System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression'." #31946
  • Multiple Navigations to same key when building Migration #31945
  • [8.0-rc.1] 'dbcontext optimize' fails with 'Only primitive constant nodes are supported.', works in 7.0.11 #31942

Closed

  • EF Core for Cosmos is setting an Owned Entity Property with the same value as the Key #31903
  • SQLite affinity fallback is wrong: fallback to blob instead of numeric #31915
  • How can I map a class inheriting from UserControl? #31842
  • EFCore deletes an association on DbContext.SaveChanges when an existing link is removed and then added in the same transaction #31736
  • EFCore7 GetAsync Error Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'second') #31717
  • Hierarchyid in a parameter collection does not work in 8.0-rc1 with MSSQL #31912
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to define relationships that could reference one of multiple tables without foreign keys? #31913
  • JSON: empty json collection is not correctly materialized, but rather returned as null #31731
    8.0.0
  • JSON Columns produce NULL value for empty collections #29348
    8.0.0
  • Query test infra: consider adding `IEnumerable<TResult> expectedResult` option to AssertQuery #31938
    MQ
  • Specifying enum typed discriminator on an entity type results in opaque ArgumentExceptions at query time #31547
    8.0.0
  • A property on a nested owned entity is not being saved in the CosmosDB document #31664
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST ONLY] More AssertQuery refactoring #31956
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #31954
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #31953
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30391 - JSON column issue with SetTableName() #31951
  • [release/8.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31950
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31949
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the EntityMaterializerSource #31943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Validate single discriminator values #31937
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Cosmos: Persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31936
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [TEST ONLY] Check if tests have any results rather than looking at entry count #31922
  • Calculate sentinel value inside RuntimeProperty #31923
  • [release/8.0] Make Contains work again over hierarchyid #31930
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Respect the difference between null/empty for owned collections mapped to JSON #31831
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Validate single discriminator values #31916
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31933
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
